When I first downloaded, it was fine. Then it got hectic. My storage suddenly became zero. My life? Flashing before my eyes. Then, as if out of some cliche movie, the clock started ticking as my heart pounded. The time was close, but yet, I had a strange admiration for the clock. It was... comforting. This comfort did not last for long, however, in less than a second my entire being was consumed by...
